INTEGRITY_SINGLE_BID.name: Single bidder contract
INTEGRITY_SINGLE_BID.desc: Single bid signals a risk when only one bid is submitted in a tender in a competitive market.

INTEGRITY_CALL_FOR_TENDER_PUBLICATION.name: Call for tenders publication
INTEGRITY_CALL_FOR_TENDER_PUBLICATION.desc: Not publishing calls for tender signals a risk when no call for tenders is published prior to a contract award, decreasing the potential bidder pool.

INTEGRITY_PROCEDURE_TYPE.name: Procedure type
INTEGRITY_PROCEDURE_TYPE.desc: Non-open procedures signal a risk of using procedures types which are less open for competition and more readily used for directly contracting connected companies (e.g. negotiated without publication).

INTEGRITY_ADVERTISEMENT_PERIOD.name: Length of advertisement period
INTEGRITY_ADVERTISEMENT_PERIOD.desc: Advertisement period length reveals the risk of suspiciously tight bidding deadlines or when advertisement period is excessively long.

INTEGRITY_DECISION_PERIOD.name: Length of decision period
INTEGRITY_DECISION_PERIOD.desc: Length of decision period signals risks when the the decision period length is either suspiciously short or suspiciously long.

INTEGRITY_NEW_COMPANY.name: New company
INTEGRITY_NEW_COMPANY.desc: New company signals the risk of a very young company winning a tender (younger than 1 year at the time of winning).

INTEGRITY_TAX_HAVEN.name: Tax haven
INTEGRITY_TAX_HAVEN.desc: Tax haven signals a risk when the supplier is located in a tax haven country (based on the financial secrecy index).

INTEGRITY_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH.name: Description length
INTEGRITY_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH.desc: Product description length signals the risk of product description being tailored to one company, when the description is excessively long.

INTEGRITY_POLITICAL_CONNECTIONS_OF_SUPPL.name: Political connections of suppliers
INTEGRITY_POLITICAL_CONNECTIONS_OF_SUPPL.desc: Political connection of the supplier captures the risk of at least one owner or manager holding a political office.

INTEGRITY_WINNER_CA_SHARE.name: Winner contract share
INTEGRITY_WINNER_CA_SHARE.desc: Winner contract share is the share of contract value won by a given company from a given buyer in a given year.

INTEGRITY_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_LENGTH.name: Eligibility criteria length
INTEGRITY_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_LENGTH.desc: Eligibility criteria length signals the risk of criteria being tailored to one company with the criteria description being excessively long.

INTEGRITY_EVALUATION_CRITERIA.name: Evaluation criteria
INTEGRITY_EVALUATION_CRITERIA.desc: Evaluation criteria signal the risk of using non-quantitative criteria to assess bidders which are subjective and can easily be manipulated.

INTEGRITY_NR_OF_REQUESTED_BIDS.name: Number of requested bids
INTEGRITY_NR_OF_REQUESTED_BIDS.desc: Low number of requested bids signals a risk when only low number of bidders can submit bids in a competitive market.

TRANSPARENCY_PUBLICATION_RATE.name: Publication rate
TRANSPARENCY_PUBLICATION_RATE.desc: Publication rate is the ratio of advertised public procurement spending over the total public procurement spending of a given contracting authority.

TRANSPARENCY_NUMBER_OF_KEY_MISSING_FIELD.name: Share of non-missing key fields
TRANSPARENCY_NUMBER_OF_KEY_MISSING_FIELD.desc: Number of key missing fields is the ratio of fields with missing values in the call for tender and contract award announcement related to a given tender (based on the most recently published versions).

TRANSPARENCY_BUYER_NAME_MISSING.name: Non-missing buyer name
TRANSPARENCY_BUYER_NAME_MISSING.desc: Buyer name is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_YEAR_MISSING.name: Non-missing year info
TRANSPARENCY_YEAR_MISSING.desc: Year is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_TITLE_MISSING.name: Non-missing title
TRANSPARENCY_TITLE_MISSING.desc: Title is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_NAME_MISSING.name: Non-missing bidder name
TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_NAME_MISSING.desc: Bidder name is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_ID_MISSING.name: Non-missing bidder ID
TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_ID_MISSING.desc: Bidd ID is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_CA_TYPE_MISSING.name: Non-missing buyer type
TRANSPARENCY_CA_TYPE_MISSING.desc: Buyer type is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_VALUE_MISSING.name: Non-missing contract value
TRANSPARENCY_VALUE_MISSING.desc: Contract value is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_IMP_LOC_MISSING.name: Non-missing implementation location
TRANSPARENCY_IMP_LOC_MISSING.desc: Implementation location is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_PROC_METHOD_MISSING.name: Non-missing procedure type
TRANSPARENCY_PROC_METHOD_MISSING.desc: Procedure type is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BID_NR_MISSING.name: Non-missing number of bids
TRANSPARENCY_BID_NR_MISSING.desc: Number of bids is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_AWARD_DATE_MISSING.name: Non-missing award date
TRANSPARENCY_AWARD_DATE_MISSING.desc: Award date is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_HEADOFENTITY_DATE_MISSING.name: Non-missing head of entity approval date
TRANSPARENCY_HEADOFENTITY_DATE_MISSING.desc: Head of entity approval date is not missing in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_COMMITTEE_DATE_MISSING.name: Non-missing committee approval date
TRANSPARENCY_COMMITTEE_DATE_MISSING.desc: Committee approval date is not missing in the published notice.
